author: Digital Foundry
description:
Digital Foundry is now fully independent! Join the DF Supporter Program and support the team: https://bit.ly/3jEGjvx

Developer Game Freak builds on the battle mechanics laid in place in 2022's Pokémon Legends Arceus, this time taking its new effort to an urban city setting. Switch 2 also receives a dedicated version of the game - albeit at a $10 extra expense - but are the visual upgrades and performance improvements worth the cost? Tom runs through the highs and lows of what Switch 2 brings to the table this time. 

Visit the new Digital Foundry website: https://www.digitalfoundry.net

Go here to check out DF merch! https://store.digitalfoundry.net

Subscribe for more Digital Foundry: http://bit.ly/DFSubscribe

00:00 Introduction
02:25 Switch 1 vs 2 Graphics Comparison
06:48 Image Quality Upgrades
08:39 Frame-Rate Tests
10:18 Verdict
title: Pokémon: Legends Z-A - Switch 2 Review - Great Concept, Disappointing Tech
